elements.description: The box primitive creates shapes such as boxes, cubes, or walls.
The camera primitive determines what the user sees. We can change the viewport by modifying the camera entity's position and rotation.
The circle primitive creates circles surfaces using the [geometry](../components/geometry.md) component with the type set to `circle`.
The cone primitive creates a cone shape.

The cursor primitive is a reticle that allows for clicking and basic interactivity with a scene on devices that do not have a hand controller. The default appearance is a ring geometry. The cursor is usually placed as a child of the camera.

The curved image primitive creates images that bend around the user. Curved images arranged around the camera can be pleasing for legibility since each pixel sits at the same distance from the user. They can be a better choice than angled flat planes for complex layouts because they ensure a smooth surface rather than a series of awkward seams between planes.
The cylinder primitive is used to create tubes and curved surfaces.
The glTF model primitive displays a 3D glTF model created from a 3D modeling program or downloaded from the web.
The image primitive shows an image on a flat plane.
A light changes the lighting and shading of the scene.
The link primitive provides a compact API to define links that resembles the traditional `<a>` tag.

We recommend glTF for distributing assets in production over the web. Check out using the [glTF model primitive](a-gltf-model.md). You can either instead export to COLLADA and use [the converter](https://cesiumjs.org/convertmodel.html) or try out the [OBJ converter](https://github.com/AnalyticalGraphicsInc/OBJ2GLTF).
The plane primitive creates flat surfaces using the [geometry](../components/geometry.md) component with the type set to `plane`.
The ring primitive creates a ring or disc shape.
The sky primitive adds a background color or 360° image to a scene. A sky is a large sphere with a color or texture mapped to the inside.
The sound primitive wraps the [sound component](../components/sound.md).
The sphere primitive creates a spherical or polyhedron shapes. It wraps an entity that prescribes the [geometry component](../components/geometry.md) with its geometric primitive set to `sphere`.
Wraps the [text component](../components/text.md).
The torus knot primitive creates pretzel shapes using the [geometry](../components/geometry.md) component with the type set to `torusKnot`.
The torus primitive creates donut or tube shapes using the [geometry](../components/geometry.md) component with the type set to `torus`.
The triangle primitive creates triangle surfaces using the [geometry](../components/geometry.md) component with the type set to `triangle`.
The video primitive plays a video as a texture on a flat plane.
The videosphere primitive plays 360° videos in the background of the scene. Videospheres are a large sphere with the video texture mapped to the inside.
